```sql
> CREATE TABLE ex2(
>   a VARCHAR(10),
>   b NVARCHAR(15),
>   c TEXT,
>   d INTEGER,
>   e FLOAT,
>   f BOOLEAN,
>   g CLOB,
>   h BLOB,
>   i TIMESTAMP,
>   j NUMERIC(10,5)
>   k VARYING CHARACTER (24),
>   l NATIONAL VARYING CHARACTER(16)
> );
> 
> ```

```sql
> sqlite> SELECT typeof('abc'+123);
> numeric
> sqlite> SELECT typeof('abc'||123);
> text
> 
> ```
